de.ralleytn.simple.image

Class SimpleImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ralleytn.simple.image.SimpleImage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleImageFX

    public class SimpleImage
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an image. The image data is saved in a two dimensional integer array. One integer saves a pixel with the color model ARGB. No hardware acceleration is possible with this class. All calculations are done on the CPU. This ensures that all images regardless of their color model are equally fast. There also is no useless over head. Doing image processing is no problem for this class as it already contains a good amount of pre written methods.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    Ralph Niemitz/RalleYTN(ralph.niemitz@gmx.de)

      • AXIS_X

        public static final int AXIS_X
        Used for mirror(int). Represents the X axis of an image.
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • AXIS_Y

        public static final int AXIS_Y
        Used for mirror(int). Represents the Y axis of an image.
        Since:
        1.0.0
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SCALE_NEAREST_NEIGHBOUR

        public static final ScaleAlgorithm SCALE_NEAREST_NEIGHBOUR
        Used for scale(int, int, ScaleAlgorithm), scaleByFactor(float, ScaleAlgorithm) and scaleToFit(int, int, ScaleAlgorithm). A simple and really fast scaling algorithm that produces images with low quality. Recommended for pixel arts or thumbnails.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • SCALE_BILINEAR_INTERPOLATION

        public static final ScaleAlgorithm SCALE_BILINEAR_INTERPOLATION
        Used for scale(int, int, ScaleAlgorithm), scaleByFactor(float, ScaleAlgorithm) and scaleToFit(int, int, ScaleAlgorithm). A bit more complex than SCALE_NEAREST_NEIGHBOUR causing it to be slower, but the quality of resulting images is better.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • ROTATE_BILINEAR_INTERPOLATION

        public static final RotationAlgorithm ROTATE_BILINEAR_INTERPOLATION
        Used for rotate(double, RotationAlgorithm), rotate(double, Dimension, RotationAlgorithm), rotate(double, int, int, int, int, RotationAlgorithm) and rotate(double, Dimension, Point, RotationAlgorithm). Not as fast as ROTATE_NEAREST_NEIGHBOUR but it produces better results.
        Since:
        1.1.0

      • ROTATE_NEAREST_NEIGHBOUR

        public static final RotationAlgorithm ROTATE_NEAREST_NEIGHBOUR
        Used for rotate(double, RotationAlgorithm), rotate(double, Dimension, RotationAlgorithm), rotate(double, int, int, int, int, RotationAlgorithm) and rotate(double, Dimension, Point, RotationAlgorithm). Fast rotation algorithm.
        Since:
        1.1.0

        height - height of the resulting image
        Returns:
        the scaled image
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If width or height is smaller than 1
        Since:
        1.0.0

        public static final SimpleImage getClipboardImage()
                                           throws java.awt.datatransfer.UnsupportedFlavorException,
                                                  java.io.IOException
        Returns:
        the image from the clipboard or null if there is no readable image on the clipboard.
        Throws:
        java.awt.datatransfer.UnsupportedFlavorException - if the requested data flavor is not supported
        java.io.IOException - if the data is no longer available in the requested flavor
        Since:
        1.1.0
